Title: Requires securities dealers and brokers to have a professional liability insurance policy of at least one million dollars
Summary: Requires securities dealers and brokers to have a professional liability insurance policy of at least one million dollars; requires proof of such insurance policy to be submitted to the department of law; requires notice of such insurance policy to be provided to clients.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the insurance law, in relation to requiring securities dealers and brokers to have a professional liability insurance policy of at least one million dollars
